articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Pays Courtesy Call on Iranian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Pays Courtesy Call on Iranian President
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, paid a courtesy call on Iranian President Hassan Rouhani on Saturday.
					 Kim Yong Nam conveyed greetings from supreme leader Kim Jong Un to the Iranian president.
					
					 The president expressed deep thanks for this and asked him to convey his sincere salute to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Recollecting with deep emotion the day when he had the honor of being received by the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung 30 years ago, he stressed that the friendly and cooperative ties between the Islamic Republic of Iran and the DPRK would grow stronger in the future.
					
					 The talk proceeded in a friendly atmosphere.
					
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and Jo In Chol, DPRK ambassador to Iran, and from the Iranian side were Foreign Minister Ali Akbar Salehi and other officials concerned.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lashes at U.S. Moves to Sell Latest Weapons to S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lashes at U.S. Moves to Sell Latest Weapons to S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. bureau for cooperation in defense security informed south Korea in the middle of July of its plan for selling 260 latest medium-range air-to-air missiles and their parts and requested approval from U.S. Congress.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a dangerous move to upset the military equilibrium on the Korean Peninsula and instigate the south Korean warmongers to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. claim that arms sale meets the goal of its diplomatic policy and national interests fully reveals its aggressive nature, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 It is the basic objective of the U.S. Asian policy to invade Asian countries by using south Korea as an advanced base. To this end, the U.S. has steadily shipped its weapons into south Korea, keeping its aggressor troops there for more than half a century. South Korea is recognized as the biggest advanced nuclear base of the U.S. in the Far East.
					
					 The U.S. is often trumpeting about the non-existent "security threat" in a bid to cover up its aggressive design.
					
					 However, it is nonsensical to claim that the U.S. national interests are encroached on by the far-off DPRK.
					
					 It is no more than sophism to talk about its plan to sell missiles to south Korea under the pretext of "transfer of the right to control wartime operations."
					
					 The U.S. is mulling raking up huge profits through the sale of missiles under the pretext of this transfer of the right.
					
					 It is a daydream for the U.S. to realize its ambition for aggression by instigating the south Korean war-thirsty forces.
					
					 The U.S. had better roll back its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Party Accused of Torpedoing Investigation into IS Case
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Party Accused of Torpedoing Investigation into IS Case
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Civic, social and religious organizations in south Korea are strongly denouncing the south Korean "Saenuri Party" for torpedoing the state investigation into the case of the Intelligence Service's (IS) illegal interference in the election.
					 The Emergency Situation Council to Denounce the IS's Interference in Presidential Election which consists of at least 200 civic and social organizations held a press conference in Seoul on August 1.
					
					 At the conference the speakers deplored that the Special Committee of the "National Assembly" for State Investigation into the IS Case is on the verge of bankruptcy and the investigation has reached the phase where it is hard to achieve any aim in actuality.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" is to wholly blame for this situation, they charged.
					
					 The Solidarity for Eliminating Discrimination against the Handicapped also held a press conference in Seoul that day. It warned that the present regime would face strong resistance of the people if it attempts to cover up the IS's violation of democracy.
					
					 More than 30 believers affiliated to the Catholic Joint Measure Committee against IS's Interference in Election held a prayer meeting at Chonggye Plaza in Seoul on the same day censuring the crime of the "Saenuri Party".

articles.title: Punishment of Lee Myung Bak Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of Lee Myung Bak Demanded in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Members of civic organizations including the Headquarters of All-People Movement for Impeaching Lee Myung Bak held a press conference in Seoul on August 1 demanding the punishment of the traitor.
					 Speakers said that the project for improving four large rivers pressed ahead with by the Lee Myung Bak regime turned out to be a farce deceiving the people.
					
					 Fishes perished en masse in the rivers and trees along their banks died due to the project, seriously destroying the environment, they noted, calling for condemning and punishing Lee without fail in order to settle the problem.
					
					 They demanded the present regime launch a strict investigation into Lee's misrule.

articles.title: Candlelight Rally Held in S. Korea
articles.content:
Candlelight Rally Held in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- A candlelight rally took place in Seoul on Saturday demanding the extension of the period of the state investigation into the case of the Intelligence Service's (IS) illegal interference in the election, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 Present there were members of the Emergency Situation Council to Denounce the IS's Interference in Presidential Election, figures of opposition parties and people from all walks of life, more than 15 000 in all.
					
					 They deplored that state investigation to probe the truth about the case is on the verge of bankruptcy due to the obstructions of the "Saenuri Party."
					
					 The political camp should not disregard the people's demand, they held, calling for extending the period of the investigation to disclose IS's criminal acts.

articles.title: International Seminar Held in Tokyo
articles.content:
International Seminar Held in Tokyo
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- An international seminar took place in Tokyo on August 1 to mark the 60th anniversary of the conclusion of the Armistice Agreement.
					 Former U.S. Attorney General Ramsey Clark in a report said that he was deeply impressed to see the struggle of the DPRK people during his visit to the country on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. He noted he was convinced there are no "human rights abuses" in the DPRK claimed by Western countries. 
					
					 He noted that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK has a baneful impact on the regional situation as it stirs up the war atmosphere on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Saying the U.S. sanctions put pressure on the DPRK, he urged the former to roll back its hostile policy toward the latter and come out for the conclusion of a peace treaty.
					
					 Honorary Professor Michel Chossudovsky of University of Ottawa in Canada in a report said that the U.S. is bringing the danger of a war to the Korean Peninsula and has kept DPRK-targeted nuclear weapons in south Korea for more than half a century, escalating the tension. 
					
					 The DPRK, victim of the U.S. aggression, is compelled to bolster up its capability for self-defence, he stressed.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The speakers recalled that the U.S. government has ceaselessly staged military exercises and perpetrated provocations against the DPRK under the simulated conditions of contingency on the Korean Peninsula, adding that this seriously threatens peace on the peninsula.
					
					 They declared that it is the policy of the U.S. government to preserve the war state and the world peace-loving people should never pardon it.
					
					 They demanded the U.S. lift the sanctions against the DPRK and pursue a foreign policy based on respect and equality.
					
					 A press conference was held prior to the seminar.
					
					 Speakers there underscored the need to force all the U.S. troops to pull out of the Korean Peninsula and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea without fail.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was brought out in pamphlet by the Zeya Publishing House in Blagobeshensk City of Amur Region, Russia on July 25. 
					 This speech made by Kim Jong Un at the military parade for celebrating the centenary of birth of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies that the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation proves the immutable truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and nation.
					
					 It indicates the tasks for demonstrating the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully accomplishing the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Foreign Personages Pay Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Foreign Personages Pay Congratulatory Visits to DPRK Missions
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Personages of various countries paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK missions in their countries from July 23 to 29 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 They were the head of A Just Russia Group of the Khabarovsk Territory Legislative Assembly, first secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, first deputy editor-in-chief of the Patriot, vice-president of the Russian Federation of International Charity Organizations "World of Goodwill", president of the International Academy of Sociology, chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, president of the Bangladesh People's League, secretary general of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, delegates of the Vietnamese national wrestling team, chairman of the Malaysian preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War, manager of M.K.P. Company of Malaysia and the manager of a coal and mineral company of Malaysia.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before portraits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and full-length pictures of them standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The general chairman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle sent a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Jakarta on July 26.

articles.title: Russian Papers Observe Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War
articles.content:
Russian Papers Observe Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Russian papers devoted special write-ups to the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Khakasia on July 10 carried an article titled "Korea yesterday and today" illustrated with a photo of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The paper said:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists occupied south Korea after the liberation of Korea from Japan and made premeditated preparations for invading the DPRK. They finally ignited a war on June 25, 1950.
					
					 The Korean army and people under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung beat back the enemy troops superior in numerical strength and military technique and defended the sovereignty of the country by displaying matchless courage.
					
					 July 27 is marked as the day of great victory for the DPRK.
					
					 The President turned the DPRK into a power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence in a short span of time.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is steering the Korean people's struggle to carry out the behests of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Korean people will surely build a thriving socialist nation, sharing the same will and destiny with Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Nakhodkinski Rabochi on July 19 carried photos documenting the exploits of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un and an article noting that the Korean people are wrapped in a festive mood to celebrate July 27.
					
					 Nizhegorodskaya Pravda and Bremya Peremon Plus TV on July 18 and 24 carried articles under the title "Korean people's victory" illustrated with photos of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The papers praised the immortal exploits of the Generalissimos.

articles.title: Fate of U.S. "Ever-victorious" Generals in Korean War
articles.content:
Fate of U.S. "Ever-victorious" Generals in Korean War
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article under the headline "Fate of 'Ever-victorious' Generals" on its website on July 23 to mark the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 In the Korean war the U.S. sustained a heavy defeat for the first time in history though it boasted of being the "strongest" in the world. The U.S. generals who boasted of being "ever-victorious" met a miserable fate in the war, it said.
					
					 An article under the subtitle "Dean captured prisoner" noted:
					
					 Dean, commander of the U.S. 24th division, dispatched the "Smith commando unit" to the area of Osan as an advance party in an effort to block the advance of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and ensure the operation of the main force of the division but the commando unit was wiped out in the battle with the KPA.
					
					 At that time he bragged he would set an example in Taejon and regain confidence, grumbling that the setback was the biggest shame on the great United States of America.
					
					 However, the 24th division was completely encircled and wiped out in Taejon by superb war methods of combined units of the KPA. 
					
					 Dean was captured by a KPA soldier while running away in the private's uniform, without caring about the reputation of the "general". 
					
					 An article under the subtitle "General Smith looking down at dead bodies" said:
					
					 The 1st division of the U.S. Marines intruded into Lake Jangjin in the northern part of Korea, boasting of being "flowers of the Marines." But it met a wholesale death due to the encircling offensive of the KPA.
					
					 This heavy fiasco gave Smith a nickname of "general looking down at dead bodies".
					
					 Another article under the subtitle "Death of Walker" was posted on the website. It said:
					
					 Walker commanded all the land operations of the "UN Forces" as a commander of the U.S. 8th Army in the early period of the war and drove its troops into massacring innocent Koreans in the areas under their temporary occupation. But he was trapped in the siege and mine warfare of the second front units of the KPA in the rear and met death while taking to flight with heavy tanks in the van.
					
					 An article under the subtitle "Tears of Clark" said:
					
					 Clark attempted to demonstrate the might of "UN Forces" and achieve truce with honor by launching a "new offensive" as the last gambling after his appointment as a commander of the "UN Forces".  But his scenario completely went bust and was compelled to sign the Armistice Agreement little short of an instrument of surrender.
					
					 His mother was reported to have said when meeting him at the airfield that tears ran down his cheek with his upbeat spirit and appearance gone.

articles.title: Meeting in Russia Denounces U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Meeting in Russia Denounces U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- A meeting condemning the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK took place in Vladivostok, Russia on July 22 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 It was attended by personages of various political parties and organizations of Russia and masses.
					
					 The secretary of the Maritime Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation in a speech said the Korean war was the just Fatherland Liberation War of the Korean people against the U.S. imperialists' invasion.
					
					 The secretary went on:
					
					 The U.S. indiscriminately bombed and bombarded many cities and villages in Korea during the three-year war, reducing them to debris. 
					
					 It turned south Korea into the biggest nuclear arsenal in the Far East and has staged ceaseless nuclear war drills targeting the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has made sincere efforts to achieve durable peace on the Korean Peninsula and national reunification since its foundation.
					
					 It demands the conclusion of a peace treaty with the U.S. and the withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea. 
					
					 This is a just demand for ensuring peace on the peninsula and achieving reunification.
					
					 The participants in the meeting denounced the U.S. imperialists for bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Political Party Leader of Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported by Political Party Leader of Democratic Congo
						
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Jimmy Kikoni, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Democratic Congo, released a statement on July 24 to mark the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Extending glory to the brave and revolutionary Korean people celebrating the 60th anniversary of the victory in the war, the statement noted:
					
					 July 27, 1953 was the day which proved the truth that no strong army equipped with ultra-modern war hardware can ever defeat the people who determinedly rose up to safeguard their homeland.
					
					 The Korean people had to beat back the U.S. aggression soon after their liberation from the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists. However, they could defeat the U.S. which boasted of its "mightiness", thanks to the superb strategy and tactics and wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The Korean war convinced the world people that the revolutionary leadership of a great leader was a decisive factor that made it possible to achieve a miraculous victory.
					
					 I am sure that the heroic and diligent Korean people will as ever achieve a final victory in their just cause of building an economic power and pushing forward socialist construction under the leadership of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de Banda Moranbong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de Banda Moranbong 
						
Pyongyang, 4 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar la funcion de la Banda Moranbong para felicitar a los participantes en el desfile militar dedicado al 60o aniversario del triunfo en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, la presencio junto con ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Kyok Sik, Jang Jong Nam, Ri Yong Gil, Mun Kyong Dok, O Il Jong, Kim Kyong Ok y Kim Yong Chol.
					
					El Mariscal salio al asiento junto con Ri Sol Ju respondiendo a las fervientes aclamaciones de los espectadores y felicito a quienes al tomar parte en el desfile militar demostraron a todo el mundo el impetu de la Corea del Songun de levantar sin falta un Estado prospero socialista sobre este territorio donde estan registradas las imperecederas hazanas de triunfo en guerra y la revolucion del Songun del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					En la escena de la funcion, iniciada con la interpretacion del "Himno nacional", se pusieron variadas piezas inclusive la musica instrumental y cancion "Todas las fuerzas para la victoria en la guerra", la musica ligera "Paso de la montana Mungyong", el solo femenino y pangchang "!Cuenten, fuegos artificiales de la victoria!", el quinteto femenino "En el manantial", la musica instrumental y cancion "!Viva el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung!", el coro femenino "Tributo a los vencedores de la gran epoca", el coro femenino "Marcha del 27 de julio", la musica ligera "Mirennos", la musica instrumental y canciones en serie "Respaldaremos con las armas a nuestro Comandante Supremo" y el duo femenino y pangchang "Nuestra bayoneta garantiza la paz".
					
					A traves de la funcion, las ejecutantes mostraron con profunda impresion que la victoria en la pasada contienda coreana fue el resultado de las autoctonas ideas militares del Presidente, sus extraordinarias estrategias y tacticas y su arte de mando militar sin par, y constituyo el triunfo enorgullecedor del poderio de la unidad monolitica y las indoblegables fuerzas espirituales del ejercito y pueblo unidos compactamente en torno al partido y al lider.
					
					Cada vez que se proyectaban las imagenes del Presidente y el Dirigente y se escuchaban las voces del Presidente pronunciando discurso, los espectadores ovacionaron muy emocionados.
					
					Cuando se interpreto la cancion "Quien se encarga de nuestro destino y futuro" y se veia en la pantalla la imagen generosa del Mariscal, los espectadores se pusieron de pie y aplaudieron cantando junto con las ejecutantes.
					
					Terminada la funcion, el Mariscal felicito los exitos agitando la mano hacia las ejecutantes y espectadores.
					
					Expuso su gran esperanza y conviccion de que los participantes en el desfile militar cumpliran con su honrosa mision y deberes en el empeno por defender el socialismo y construir un Estado prospero con el espiritu de lucha heroica de la decada de 1950.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje oral en memoria de Jong Mong Hon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje oral en memoria de Jong Mong Hon
						
Pyongyang, 4 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio un mensaje oral en memoria de Jong Mong Hon, ex presidente del Grupo Hyundai del Sur de Corea, en ocasion del 10o aniversario de su deceso.
					Won Tong Yon, vicepresidente del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico, lo entrego el dia 3 cortesmente a Hyon Jong Un, quien es presidenta del citado grupo y tambien familiar del difunto.
					
					En su misiva, el Mariscal dijo que Jong Mong Hon allano el camino de la reconciliacion y  cooperacion nacionales e hizo grandes trabajos para el desarrollo de relaciones intercoreanas y la gran empresa de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Y formulo votos por la gloria del difunto y buenos resultados de la familia de Jong incluyendo Hyon Jong Un y el Grupo Hyundai.
					
					Hyon Jong Un agradecio por el mensaje oral del Mariscal y le dirigio el saludo de gratitud en reflejo de ardiente sentimiento de los familiares del difunto y el Grupo Hyundai.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto de recordacion en ocasion de 10o aniversario de deceso de Jong Mong Hon
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto de recordacion en ocasion de 10o aniversario de deceso de Jong Mong Hon
Pyongyang, 4 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 3 en el monte Kumgang el acto de recordacion en ocasion del 10o aniversario de fallecimiento de Jong Mong Hon, ex presidente del Grupo Hyundai del Sur de Corea.
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion por la parte surcoreana Hyon Jong Un, presidenta del grupo citado y familiar de Jong Mong Hon, y los relacionados del Grupo Hyundai.
					
					Por la parte norcoreana, estuvieron presentes Won Tong Yon, vicepresidente del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP), Hwang Ho Yong, titular de la Direccion de la Zona Especial del Turismo Internacional al Monte Kumgang, y otros funcionarios relacionados.
					
					Ante todo, los participantes colocaron ramos de flores ante la lapida con firma del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il en el monte Kumgang y rindieron homenaje.
					
					En el acto de recordacion, fueron depositados las ofrendas y ramos de flores en nombre del Grupo Hyundai y el CCPAP.
					
					Los huespedes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del difunto.
					
					En su discurso de la ocasion, Hwang senalo que junto con el presidente honorario Jong Ju Yong el difunto allano el camino de reconciliacion y la cooperacion con el ardiente amor a la patria y la nacion y se esforzo con toda abnegacion por el desarrollo de las relaciones intercoreanas y la gran empresa de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Al apreciar el patriotismo de Jong Mong Hon, el Generalisimo le dio gran benevolencia y confianza, asevero.
					
					Prosiguio que en acato alto al noble proposito del Generalisimo, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un presta profunda atencion a los familiares y al Grupo Hyundai y dispenso la magnanimidad en relacion con que se cumplen 10 anos desde cuando falleciera Jong Mong Hon.
					
					Los hombres relacionados de Hyundai expusieron sus determinaciones de lograr el gran proposito de reconciliacion y colaboracion, deseado tanto por Jong Ju Yong y Jong Mong Hon, y esforzarse por reanudar cuanto antes el turismo al monte Kumgang.
